Text: Does it work on any version? How do you burn it? Have tryed with nero "burn image to disk" but it doesn't work.

Mount the .nrg file in for example deamon tools (if u don´t have it then download it from deamon tools official homepage its free!).

Then u do a dvd-copy in nero and your sorce disk will be your "mounted" dvd.

and then your done!
